text: fa'amaa thamud fa'uhlikuu balsyht aleazimat alty jawzt alhadi fi shdtha, wamma ead f'uhliku birih bardt shadidat alhbwb, sllatha allah ealayhim sabe layal wathamaniat 'ayaam mttabet, la taftur wala tnqte, fataraa alqawm fi tilk allyaly walayam mwta ka'anahum aswl nakhl kharibt mtaklt alajwaf. fahal taraa lhwla' alqawm min nfs baqiatan dun hlak?
